description:
Have you ever wondered how to build scalable sales funnels that convert cold traffic into customers?

If the answer to this question is ‘Yes’, then you are in the right place at the right time. In this course, you’ll discover how to build a converting sales funnel from scratch, even if you haven’t done it before! 

Learn How To Take The Best Seat In The House And Build Funnels That Convert:

  • How To Structure Your Customer Acquisition Funnel
  • Step-By-Step Guide To Build A Funnel From Scratch
  • How To Write Copy Like A World Class Copywriter


Contents & Overview

In this course, you’ll learn how to design your sales funnel that will turn cold traffic into repeat customers. 

First, we’ll cover what customer acquisition funnels are and why they work. You’ll also discover the #1 mistake to avoid when designing your funnel. 

Next, I’ll walk you through the process of designing your product line, based on which you can develop a profitable sales sequence. I’ll walk you through the 4 elements of a customer acquisition funnel and share detailed instructions on how to design products your prospects want. 

Last but not least, you’ll discover how to write a compelling copy for your offers, the No. 1 tool to build your funnel and the three highest points of leverage to optimize your funnel. 

By the time you complete this training, you’ll know all the tools & strategies to create a sales funnel that converts, even if you haven’t done it before!
title: How To Design A Sales Funnel That Converts
